response.overview: Zhang Yu, a flight attendant from China arrives in Moscow, a city with a different culture, with a different language. Yu clearly knows that a career of a flight attendant is not for her, she sees the world differently, not like everyone else, but her father, a pilot, who arranged for her to work in that area, does not understand this. The whole world is filled with screaming incomprehension. The only person who will understand it is Jan, a photographer who hears the world through a hearing aid and therefore also has difficulty in communication.
response.title: While it's Rattling Around
